body:
It should be the same of course. Here is the [example from php docs](http://php.net/manual/en/class.datetime.php#datetime.constants.types)
DATE_ATOM
Atom (example: 2005-08-15T15:52:01+00:00)

Yes it seems that there is a problem with escaping. Would like to fix. Assign please.
@snedi feel free to work on it.
is that with or without intl extension installed? Looks like a problem with the format converter.
This one looks to be relatively easy to cover with tests since @MelleDijkstra did a great job finding out exact conditions when it fails.
The issue is in `BaseFormatConverter::convertDatePhpToIcu()`. Seems we can't solve the issue and keep using `strtr` at the same time.
